VB_AcquiredOwlbear.synopsis: Player has freed owlbear. It's a vicious creature. The player has directed it back to the camp.

VB_AcquiredOwlbear_0.speaker: Player
VB_AcquiredOwlbear_0.text: Poor creature. I hope it can follow my scent to camp.
VB_AcquiredOwlbear_0.context: NodeContext: Player has freed an owlbear. It's a vicious creature and there is every chance it might turn on the player.
